description: Data-driven world configuration schema for Genesis Mythos World Creator

params.label: Seed
params.tooltip: World generation seed. Same seed produces identical worlds. Change for variation.

params.label: Random Seed
params.tooltip: Generate a random new seed for world generation.

params.label: Size Preset
params.tooltip: Select world size preset. Larger sizes take longer to generate but provide more detail.

params.label: Shape Preset
params.tooltip: Select map shape preset. Controls the overall shape of the generated terrain.

params.label: Elevation Scale
params.tooltip: Controls the overall height scale of the terrain. Higher values create more dramatic elevation changes.

params.label: Terrain Chaos
params.tooltip: Controls terrain randomness and variation. Higher values create more chaotic, unpredictable terrain.

params.label: Domain Warp Strength
params.tooltip: Domain warping strength (0-100). Creates organic, flowing terrain patterns by distorting noise coordinates.

params.label: Domain Warp Frequency
params.tooltip: Domain warping frequency (0.001-0.1). Controls the scale of the warping effect.

params.label: Enable Erosion
params.tooltip: Enable erosion simulation. Erosion simulates natural weathering, creating valleys and smoothing terrain.

params.label: Erosion Strength
params.tooltip: Erosion strength (0-100). Controls how much material is moved by erosion.

params.label: Erosion Iterations
params.tooltip: Number of erosion passes (1-10). More iterations create smoother, more eroded terrain.

params.label: Enable Rivers
params.tooltip: Enable river generation in the terrain. Rivers will follow natural height gradients.

params.label: River Curvature
params.tooltip: Controls how much rivers curve and meander (0.1-2.0). Higher values create more winding rivers.

params.label: Noise Type
params.tooltip: Select the noise algorithm type. Perlin: smooth, Simplex: smoother, Cellular: cell-like patterns, Value: blocky.

params.label: Frequency
params.tooltip: Noise frequency. Controls the scale of terrain features.

params.label: Enable LOD
params.tooltip: Enable Level-of-Detail (LOD) system. Divides world into chunks for better performance.

params.label: LOD Levels
params.tooltip: Number of LOD levels (2-4). Higher values provide more detail levels but use more memory.

params.label: Chunk Size
params.tooltip: Chunk size in vertices (32, 64, or 128). Smaller chunks provide finer LOD control but more overhead.

params.label: Temperature
params.tooltip: Controls average temperature. Negative values create cold climates, positive values create warm climates.

params.label: Humidity
params.tooltip: Controls atmospheric humidity. Higher values create wetter climates with more precipitation.

params.label: Precipitation
params.tooltip: Controls rainfall and precipitation levels. Affects biome distribution and water features.

params.label: Wind Strength
params.tooltip: Controls wind strength and atmospheric movement. Affects climate patterns and weather systems.

params.label: Humidity
params.tooltip: Controls biome humidity distribution.

params.label: Temperature
params.tooltip: Controls biome temperature distribution.

params.label: Population Density
params.tooltip: Controls overall population density across the world.

params.label: City Count
params.tooltip: Number of major cities to generate.

params.label: Village Density
params.tooltip: Density of villages and small settlements.

params.label: Civilization Type
params.tooltip: Select the type of civilization to generate.

params.label: Enable Foliage
params.tooltip: Enable foliage generation (trees, grass, etc.).

params.label: Foliage Density
params.tooltip: Controls the density of foliage across the world.

params.label: Foliage Variation
params.tooltip: Controls variation in foliage types and distribution.

params.label: Enable Cities
params.tooltip: Generate major cities as POIs.

params.label: Enable Towns
params.tooltip: Generate towns as POIs.

params.label: Enable Ruins
params.tooltip: Generate ruins as POIs.

params.label: Enable Resources
params.tooltip: Generate resource nodes as POIs.

params.label: POI Density
params.tooltip: Controls the overall density of points of interest.

params.label: Min POI Distance
params.tooltip: Minimum distance between POIs in world units.

params.label: Mineral Richness
params.tooltip: Controls the abundance of mineral resources.

params.label: Ore Deposits
params.tooltip: Controls the abundance of ore deposits.

params.label: Gemstone Rarity
params.tooltip: Controls the rarity of gemstone deposits. Higher values = more common.

params.label: Wood Availability
params.tooltip: Controls the availability of wood resources.
